snippet: Armed men broke into a United Nations outpost in a buffer zone separating Israel and Syria to kidnap the  three military observers, the group’s peacekeeping chief said on Thursday.
abstract: Armed Syrian men break into United Nations outpost in buffer zone separating Israel and Syria in disputed Golan Heights region and abduct three military observers, holding them for about five hours before releasing them unharmed; abduction is third such kidnapping of peacekeepers since March.
lead_paragraph: Armed men broke into a United Nations outpost in a buffer zone separating Israel and Syria to kidnap the  three military observers, the group’s peacekeeping chief said on Thursday.

headline.seo: Peacekeepers in Golan Abducted but Released
headline.main: Peacekeepers in Golan Abducted but Released
headline.print_headline: Peacekeepers in Golan Abducted but Released
